name: Akiko Shimizu
backStory: Born to a Korean martial arts master and a Japanese kendo champion, Akiko grew up straddling two worlds and mastering both traditional and unconventional fighting styles. After her parents' dojo was threatened by local criminals, she developed a unique fighting style combining deadly serious techniques with seemingly ridiculous weapons to confuse and defeat her opponents while maintaining a sense of humor about the violence.

importantDates.whatHappened: Won her first martial arts tournament using only a soda straw and snowballs
Successfully defended family dojo from yakuza takeover attempt
Opened her own unconventional martial arts school
